website_summaries.verdict: If you are trying your best to treat unstable blood sugar, this cookbook will jump-start your ultra-low carb life with 100 surprisingly delicious recipes.
pros: Details the health benefits of a ketogenic diet, and how to get the most from this life change
Examples include sloppy joe chili, pesto-stuffed mushrooms, and chicken tenders
cons: This diet isn’t for the elderly or children under 18

customer_reviews.title: So helpful for keto beginners and veterans alike!
customer_reviews.text: This is the book I wish I had when I first ventured into eating a ketogenic diet. There is a lot of mis-information and even some potentially dangerous suggestions/information out there related to the ketogenic diet so it's difficult to know where to start and who to trust. This book solves that problem and then some! It's full of practical advice for how to tackle beginning a ketogenic diet and ways to tweak it. It has information on the science in a way that's easy to understand, and it has so many amazing recipes! I got a copy for me and one for my mom - so impressed.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS BOOK
customer_reviews.text: THIS BOOK IS BEAUTIFUL! As a proud owner of another of Diane's books, Practical Paleo, I knew this book was going to be incredible. I received my copy last night and instantly flipped through and made a recipe (Spiced Stuffed Eggplant!). The recipe was simple to follow, required everyday ingredients and was absolutely delicious. I'm so excited to cook my way through this cookbook. Also, this cookbook has so many beautiful images (one thing I cannot stand is a cookbook without complementary pictures) so you know exactly what the finish product will look like. Do yourself a favour, BUY THIS BOOK.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Ostrowski

customer_reviews.title: A complete guide to Keto!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are just starting Keto from having been low-carb for years. I love that this book begins chock-a-block full of actual information about how Keto works, the process, etc. I also love that there is an explaination of how there is plenty of room to be Keto in different ways, and you don’t necessarily need to count every macro for the rest of your life (a departure from many other books). The ONE drawback is that all the meals are non-dairy, which we are not, but, it shouldn’t be too difficult to find dairy swap-ins and that doesn’t bother me one little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Hackworth

customer_reviews.title: Not a cookbook
customer_reviews.text: This is a great guide for someone who is totally unfamiliar with Keto and the kitchen in general. The first 140 pages explain the diet, then there are meal plans from the super basic recipes she includes in the back. The diet guide is excellent, if you Are totally unfamiliar with the diet or transitioning from a fast food lifestyle. Anyone who has prior experience cooking real, Whole Foods will be terribly disappointed in the recipe section. She also uses a lot of ingredients that are not readily available in a rural area. I would have given this book 3 stars, but it doesn’t claim to be a cook book, so I think that was unfair
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Recipes too complicated
customer_reviews.text: I read through many reviews of keto cookbooks before choosing this one. All of the recipes contained many ingredients and unusual ingredients that I never use, don't have on hand, don't appeal to me. Not a single recipe I wanted to try. So glad I was able to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Neal M. Askew

customer_reviews.title: Solid, easy to read with tons of info
customer_reviews.text: If you want to know the FACTS about keto, this is the book. If you want to know the PRACTICALITY of keto, this is the book. If you want to know WHAT TO BUY, WHAT TO EAT, WHAT NOT TO EAT, WHAT TO COOK, HOW TO COOK, STEP BY STEP, this is the book. Diane always writes in a way that the reader gets it. The book is designed in a way that always inspires the eye and the mind. The pictures are beautiful! Really, the whole book is well done. If you are looking to go keto, GET THIS BOOK!
customer_reviews.author: T. Hurley

customer_reviews.title: A great start to the Keto Lifestyle with plenty of truly delicious recipes.
customer_reviews.text: My wife purchased this for us a few months ago and we have been enjoying it nearly every day on our new lifestyle choice. I say that this is a lifestyle choice because Keto is a way of living day-to-day in which you experience less bloating, more energy and a renewed sense of well-being that stems from quality food and ingredients and simple yet delicious cooking methods. This is a great choice for those who are interested in learning more about this diet/lifestyle and serving up truly delicious meals that the entire family will undoubtedly enjoy. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Marius Morosanu

customer_reviews.title: Overall, a very thoughtful and helpful book on the Keto Diet.
customer_reviews.text: Diane Sanfilippo, the author, is a certified nutritionist, a good writer, and seems well-informed about the ketogenic diet. What I especially liked was her writing style and her tone, careful not to overstate her case. Her book is filled with quality color photographs throughout. Almost all of her recipes are shown in living color, making them quite appealing,, thus inspiring the reader to try them out. Her recipe instructions are also quite clear. Also, she includes both a recipe index (with mini photos) and a general index, both quite helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Al M

customer_reviews.title: ♥️ Buy this book. It does NOT disappoint!! ♥️
customer_reviews.text: This book has been huge on getting us ready for keto. It includes meal plans (including a nighshade-free version), shopping lists, tips for doing keto as a family, daily trackers, daily journal and of course the receipes! Today we made our first meal from the book, Skillet Chicken Cacciatore. You guys!!!! It was AMAZING! It was one of the best meals I've ever had. And we are foodies! It was so easy to make, so simple and simply delicious! Diane has a Facebook group that goes along with the book and people have been raving about the Sloppy Joe Chili. I'm going to make that next. Buy this book. You will NOT be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: The Gifford Ranch

customer_reviews.title: The Keto Bible
customer_reviews.text: This book is amazing ... it breaks down every single question you may have to tackle understanding Keto, it really is amazing! I am a huge fan of all her books .. and this one didn't disappoint! Get it if you want to start Keto, or even just understand it!
customer_reviews.author: Verified User

customer_reviews.title: Diane Sanfllippo Never Disappoints! Keto QuickStart is Full of Great Info and Gorgeous Recipes!
customer_reviews.text: Diane Sanfillippo never disappoints. She is knowledgeable and detail oriented. This book has charts and trackers. She gives keto swap recommendations and keto ideas for every type of cuisine. This book is packed with information! The recipes look delicious and doable! While I do not do full-on Keto, I am a type two diabetic and often use keto recipes for blood sugar control. I’m thrilled to be adding yet another Diane Sanfillippo gem to my cookbook/nutrition library.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Warden

customer_reviews.title: Worth The Read!
customer_reviews.text: I have been following Diane Sanfilippo for years now. I have loved all of her books and this one did not disappoint! The attention to detail that she brings to each book is amazing. Her background in Graphic Design shows in the layout of each page. I followed the weekly menus and loved the shopping lists because I didn't have to figure out each meals grocery list on my own. I had great success following her menus and have been able to continue eating keto while incorporating other meals into my life. Every time she writes a book it is filled with so much love and insight and I appreciate that!
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Kara

customer_reviews.title: Buy for the recipes - not just for keto diets
customer_reviews.text: This book is gorgeous and packed with a ton of information, beautiful pictures and mouth-watering recipes. Diane Sanfilippo is someone who I have followed for years and I always trust her balanced approach to cooking and eating. This book does not disappoint! Aside from the recipes, my favorite part so far are the meal plan sections - there is a “Day 0” noted for food prep suggestions. All recipes have macros listed, which is super helpful regardless of what diet you are following. I bought the book for the recipes. I might not even try keto, but I am looking forward to learning.
customer_reviews.author: LauraPh

customer_reviews.title: Diane does it again!
customer_reviews.text: I have every other book that Diane has written, and once again, she has knocked it out of the park. Beyond the beautifully colorful (and realistic) food pics, the information is laid out in an easy-to-understand and extremely informative way. It's like it's inviting you to read it. I've had the pleasure of meeting her at one of her book signings, and she is one of the most intelligent, knowledgable, badass women in the business. I haven't tried any of the recipes just yet, but looking through the book and being familiar with her other recipes, I have no doubt it will all be absolutely delicious. Thank you for all you do, Diane!
customer_reviews.author: Amo B

customer_reviews.title: Loads of Information and Great Recipes Too!
customer_reviews.text: I've had Diane's Practical Paleo Cookbook for a couple years and love the info and recipes within the cookbook. When I heard she was releasing a Keto Cookbook, I knew I had to purchase it. As with Practical Paleo, Keto Quick Start is loaded with tons of nutritional information. It also includes easy to follow steps and tips for starting your Keto journey, meal plans, food charts, and of course, delicious recipes. Diane's cookbooks are well thought out and are the best that I own. I love all of the information she includes in each book. Get yourself a copy - you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Murkerson

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE this "Keto" Guide
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this "Keto" Guide book. I call it guide book because about 1/3 of the book is about "Keto" education. So many people start it wrong so I find this book very helpful, explained thoroughly but not overwhelming volume & details (although there are so many kinds of Keto & perhaps some are not wrong but different approach). Most of ingredients are not hard to find, and recipes are easy to make. I liked she included dressing & condiments (ketchup & BBQ sauce etc) too. I am 2 weeks in the Keto diet and lost 6+ lbs, hope to lose 15-18 more lbs. Highly recommend to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Beer

customer_reviews.title: Must have for Keto beginners!
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but because I Love this book I felt I needed to support it! I have been successful on the Keto diet but want to make sure I am doing it healthy and wholesome. This book has so many amazing recipes with a lot of veggies. The book also has a lot of useful information and makes Keto feel like a life style change rather then a fad diet. One of the best parts is it has multiple meal plans AND the shopping list for those meal plans! That alone is worth it! So happy I purchased this book!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Neal

customer_reviews.title: Well, She Thought of Everything.
customer_reviews.text: Diane thought of everything in Keto Quick Start. This book is laid out so beautifully. First, I’m in awe of the photography. More importantly, we are loving the recipes. My favorites are the Quick Keto Chili and the Chicolate Smoothie thing. Can’t recall the name, but trust me. They’re both crowd pleasers. Also, I’m so unorganized. Diane knee that about me, obvi. She created it all. Shopping lists, meal plans, recipes.... But one thing that you’ll love is the education you receive. She gets it. It’s in a digestible, meaningful format. She gives you the confidence you need to unleash your inner Keto beast!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: arrived damaged but great book
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived damaged from Amazon (back cover was tearing off; replacement requested) but otherwise a helpful, informative, and highly researched guide to the ketogenic approach. The breakdown was easy to follow and the appropriate foods list was very helpful. Diane's website has downloadable free resources which are helpful if you want a carry-along version of food lists like I do. Thanks for a great book!
customer_reviews.author: Michele M.

customer_reviews.title: Comprehensive, no BS info and amazing recipes and resources
customer_reviews.text: Diane does it again. Keto Quickstart is a one-of-a-kind approach to keto. It emphasizes real, nutritious foods and breaks a busts a few myths associated with the diet. Not only are there an amazing variety of recipes, but she includes a meal plan and other great resources to make transitioning into keto as easy and approachable as possible. The layout is beautiful, the food is delicious, the content is well-articulated and non-dogmatic. I'm not sure it could get any better!
customer_reviews.author: emily maloney

customer_reviews.title: A warm, intelligent, and realistic approach to Keto!
customer_reviews.text: This book is a fantastic guide to Keto if you want an informed approach that you can adapt to your everyday life. I love Diane's warm and conversational style and her recipes are absolutely delicious! As someone who has been mostly low-carb and gluten-free for a number of years, I was looking for a way that I could dip my toes into the world of Keto without feeling completely overwhelmed. Diane's approach makes it SO doable and SO non-intimidating. I love this book, and I would recommend it to anyone looking for a way to start their Keto journey.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Stampfli

customer_reviews.title: Great information and not too overwhelmingly wordy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve slowly been reading this book, but find the information super informative and really easy to read. I’ve read other Keto books and it’s always heavy with too much extra stuff that I don’t really understand. I love the texture of the pages as well. I like how she offers various meal plans. I’ve tried a couple of her instant pot recipie and my husband and I love them! I can’t wait to finish reading the book and dig into a meal plan.
customer_reviews.author: Steve and Daria Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The keto community needed this.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great resource for anyone that has even thought of doing keto or has been on that train for awhile. Her real food approch is a such breath of fresh air! Its a beautiful book, well written and easy to comprehend. She also doesnt use a bunch of hard to find ingredients. It is a must have if you might experience dairy allergy/intolerance as her recipes are not laden with pounds of cheese! And for all the “lazy keto” peeps *eyeroll* the recipes are mostly simple but also nutritionally dense. Another bravo to Diane for doing the keto community a huge favor! Thank you thank you thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Peach

customer_reviews.title: Practical, sustainable keto
customer_reviews.text: I bought this book in hope of having a better understanding of the why before the how. Diane has a talent of being able to connect and speak to her readers. I've been using this cookbook and the trackers with ease, 3 weeks of cooking out of this book and using Diane's guidelines has really made this way of eating a feasible approach. I think the absolute best part about her recipes is that my whole family loves everything I've made so far. If you're looking for a keto cookbook that's looking at whole nutrition, takes into consideration dairy allergies, and is easy to comprehend, this is the book for you!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Keto quick start cookbook
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that it is the complete opposite of the title although it has great information on how keto works on your body and how our current western diet is harming us the recipes was what I was aiming for. The recipes are at least 6 ingredients or more than you have to go on a forest hunt to find them. I thought I could go to my regular grocery store and buy them from there. It is hard enough to have to build all your food from scratch on keto this book doesn't make it any easier you can go on google and get recipes from them it will literally be the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina G

customer_reviews.title: Good information. Prepare for Spice Blends.
customer_reviews.text: I am new to Diane Sanfilippo so this was my first cookbook of hers. While I liked the information, and the recipes looked delicious, I was annoyed by the complicated spice blends that most recipes required. Ten different spice blends in all. You can order the spice blends directly from her, or make them yourself. Still giving it four stars because the information was good.
customer_reviews.author: LMK

customer_reviews.title: Bring Diane to YOUR KITCHEN!!!
customer_reviews.text: Diane’s books get better with every release. Keto can be confusing for people just starting out and this book is literally for ANY LEVEL Keto journey!!! Perfect for the newbie or great for the advanced stages!! Definitely purchase this to start the New Year on the Keto path the right way!!!!! One of Diane’s best!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent resources to start low carb
customer_reviews.text: Diane does a great job breaking down how to effectively implement Keto or a low carb approach to eating. The recipes are all straight forward and practical meals for a family. The book provides tracking tools and quick glance food guides to walk the reader through their meal plan. This book is worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: 3rd time mom

customer_reviews.title: THE Keto Book to get if you're getting a book on Keto
customer_reviews.text: Diane is so good at how she explains and breaks down what can easily be complicated information. She's straightforward, no BS, and her graphic design background means she makes THE BEST graphics and tables in her books. It is so much easier to retain information when it's put into a graphic and I have never seen any books that compare to hers when it comes to this. I'm thrilled with the content of the book and looking forward to trying some of the recipes as well - Dairy-Free Queso Dip sounds amazing and I love the spice blend recipes. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE keto quickstart
customer_reviews.text: When I got Keto Quickstart, I had been on a 1.5 YEAR stall with my weight loss, though I still have more than 100 lbs to lose AND had been doing keto + intermittent fasting. As I read, what really stood out to me was the way she talks about protein and I implemented her recommendation immediately. And guess what? Stall over. I also love the recipes. I love Diane's simple real foods approach to cooking. The recipes are easy and practical for everyday life without sacrificing deliciousness. The ranch burgers are our favorite. I also love that there isn't excessive use of sweeteners which is VERY rare is keto books.
customer_reviews.author: C. Inge

customer_reviews.title: Great Recipes & Easy to Understand!
customer_reviews.text: Diane has done it again! I have been a fan of Diane’s work for many years. Keto Quick Start is written so that one has a complete understanding of how to embark on his/her Keto journey. The science of how following a Ketogenic lifestyle is clearly spelled out. The recipes are fantastic! The Mediterranean Meatloaf is one of my many favorites which is on repeat. I started following a Keto lifestyle on January 2 using this book and have lost fifteen plus pounds without even trying!
customer_reviews.author: Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read and understand if you're new to the Keto Space
customer_reviews.text: Diane Sanfilippo has done it again. Her “Keto Quick Start” is FULL of up to date information & great recipes. I’m not for fad diets. I’m about a healthy & balanced lifestyle. I personally have NO interest in measuring my ketone levels in my blood or counting grams of carbs but I do love the knowledge she drops & the healthy suggestions she gives for daily meals. Her book Practical Paleo I will re-read from time to time because I just love the refresh. Her Keto book is definitely a new fav. with suggestions for foods to shop for and eat when you're on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: This book is inspirational!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this book!!! Even if you are a Keto expert, there is so much valuable information in this book. I have had so much success on the Keto diet, and this book has given me the inspiration to permanently eat Keto. It explains everything. I will be referring to this book forevermore! It is about being healthy, and it truly explains which foods to eat and why. I received the book yesterday, and I am almost done reading it. I simply feel empowered, and it has validated this way of eating for me, and it has given me reminders about why Keto is so good for your body! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi D.

customer_reviews.title: Diane is a freaking rockstar.
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this book is is beautiful - the pictures and illustrations are amazing and so helpful! This book truly breaks down the ketogenic in a way that is easy follow and apply to you life. I had always wanted to try a ketogenic diet but hated the idea of consuming so much dairy and protein...this book changes the game in that myth! It’s a whole foods based approach that priorities nutrient dense foods and that is so so important. Thank you for providing such an awesome resource Diane, I’m literally reading it like a text book withy highlighter in hand! ps....the Super Garlic Stir-Fry Bowl is out of this world delicious!!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylie W.

customer_reviews.title: Superior expertise on the Keto diet
customer_reviews.text: Diane spends so much time digging deep into important details. This isn’t just any book on the Keto Diet. It’s a nutrition based deep dive into making the science of Ketosis work in a safe, enjoyable, healthy way.
customer_reviews.author: K. Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Amazing resource - keto or not! 5 stars!! 🌟
customer_reviews.text: Diane does it again! Keto QuickStart is fantastic... visual, a ton of valuable information, great resources (guides & more) PLUS delicious food! We’ve made the sloppy joe chili, Caesar salads, crispy chicken creamy Alfredo... all hubby & toddler approved! I can’t wait to continue cooking from it. I cannot personally eat a super low carb/keto diet, but I’m thrilled to have this in my kitchen & modify to fit my needs!!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Markovitz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome resource for healthy eating!
customer_reviews.text: I have been paleo for awhile now so trying out the keto plan was not that difficult. This book has a ton of awesome recipes. Diane keeps it simple but yet packed with flavor. The plan is easy to follow. Diane’s book is also beautiful with all her food photography. I love when cookbooks have pictures that go with the recipes so I know if I did it right!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Best real food keto recipes.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite “version” of keto I’ve ever seen. The recipes are great, easy and with easy to find ingredients (ever start a meal plan and have to find 15 weird expensive hard to find foods? 😬 Not so with this one). I love the real foods (not lbs of added fat) recipes with veggies too. Even the kids have liked all the recipes. 🙌🏻
customer_reviews.author: Josh Bates

customer_reviews.title: Comprehensive, educational and easy to read
customer_reviews.text: Love this book! I was a fan of Diane’s 21 day sugar detox book, for the same reasons. Diane’s books give great explanations and insight into the implications of our food choices and the impact on our bodies. Helpful advice without judgement!
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time looking at other Keto books, this is the one you want!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this book for a couple of weeks, and in true Diane Sanfilippo fashion, this book is phenomenal. The book is loaded with information that'll help a beginner or a veteran of a keto diet understand how the body is affected and how to live a keto lifestyle correctly. Diane also always put so much thought into her easy to follow charts, guides, and recipes (that are equipped with 'if you can't have this, omit that). There's so much to love about the book and all of the hard work put into making it a great resource! And an added bonus: the 'Best Chicken Ever' is to die for! Don't hesitate to grab yours now!
customer_reviews.author: Erika Burkert

customer_reviews.title: Finally!!!
customer_reviews.text: BEST BEGINNER BOOK EVER! This is exactly what I was looking for. I wanted more than just recipes, I wanted to be educated on why I should make these food choices and how the foods function led for me. I also loved the fact that it was not an all or nothing with her...I felt that this was obtainable for me and gave me the confidence I needed. I’m already down 2 lbs in a week. I’ll update if I need too...you all need this book! Oh, it also has menues and recipes that are yummy and easy to make!
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Comprehensive Keto guide written in plain english with great recipes
customer_reviews.text: With so many Keto resources available, I ordered this after being impressed with the author's other books. It has not disappointed. You will understand the importance of macros and how to calculate them. She gives ideas for menu planning but even if you choose not to follow them, you will still get a lot from the book. I've tried several recipes so far including the White Chicken Chili, Lemon Caper Salmon, and the simply shredded beef. They were all very good. This is worth the purchase (and joining her online community).
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Excellent guide to Keto eating whole foods!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to hear Diane would be taking on the Keto topic and she brings it all in this book. Her science based description of the how’s and why’s are huge sources of information. The meal plans are clear. The recipes are delicious!!!!! I’ve shared this book and several recipes with friends and have had great success while following her program and guidelines. Her focus of a whole foods (not the store) based approach is super important in the Keto world while others are eating “bacon stuffed with cream cheese.”
customer_reviews.author: Tara Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Great Clean Keto Recipe/Reference Book from a Paleo Aurthor Expert!
customer_reviews.text: This book is an excellent recipe book and resource guide for Keto. There are so many Keto books out there, and because I have her other Books and read her blog—I trust that she is keeping things clean and healthy. I was already eating Paleo and adjusted towards Keto-Paleo with the help of this book. The Food Swap pages is great and I love the added tips she provides...dairy-free, 21 Day sugar dectox, etc. Thanks Diane!
customer_reviews.author: stoney morgado

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 other books from Diane and I love her recipes! This is no different! I’ve made 3 and they are all so good! The chicken chili was my favorite so far, people at work almost tackled me, it smelled so good! I am not doing the keto part just yet but the information is incredibly scientific yet practical per Diane’s usual method to approaching nutrition.
customer_reviews.author: ebrownosu

customer_reviews.title: Another great book by Diane!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t follow a Keto diet, but wanted to check out this book, by Diane. I’ve been following her for years and love her simple easy to understand explanations of Paleo and Keto. There are great healthy recipes and meal ideas in this book.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley O.

customer_reviews.title: Must have for Keto lifestyle!
customer_reviews.text: Love this book. It makes Keto accessible. The language is easy to understand and the visuals are great. So far I’ve made the fish tacos and pumpkin smoothie- both were fast, easy and delicious. Highly recommend to anyone wanting to go Keto or Keto-ish. I’ve been a follower of Diane for years- I love her other books too.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Burns

customer_reviews.title: Much more simple keto approach!
customer_reviews.text: I have one of Diane’s other books Practical Paleo and this one is just as amazing. I tried Keto 6 months ago and was overwhelmed by tracking and felt like I couldn’t eat anything. Diane’s approach is much more simple and manageable. She also breaks down the information of the why and how’s of keto into easy to understand chapters. My husband and I have been following her meal plan and recipes for 2.5 weeks and we have loved every single meal. The recipes are simple but delicious and takes the guess work out of counting if you don’t feel it’s necessary for your goals.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Florentine

customer_reviews.title: Amazing !
customer_reviews.text: Amazing book teach you over all about first food life style Keto paleo exercise little bit everything you really know to understand you body and the process of food . Good quality book too like tons of pictures recipes
customer_reviews.author: sandra roman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing as always!
customer_reviews.text: I have been a fan of Diane Sanfilippo through both her books 21 Day Sugar Detox & Practical Paleo and I’m here to tell you Keto Quick Start did NOT disappoint! She has a way of completely packing her books with great information, valuable advice and beautiful charts/graphics/photos in a truly understandable format. Her books have been life changing for me and I’m thankful for all her efforts!
customer_reviews.author: Heatco

customer_reviews.title: I FINALLY Understand Keto!
customer_reviews.text: I own all of Diane’s books and this one does not disappoint. It is user friendly and everything is explained in a way that is easy to understand without making the reader feel dumb. There are SO many recipies and I’ve tried a bunch already. Everyone is delicious. There are lots of different flavor palates, and different ethnic profiles, so the food is never boring. If you don’t follow Diane on Instagram, you should. She shares so much information beyond the books. The chats among her fans in the comment section are extremely helpful too. I can not recommend this book enough.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Waxman

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect for the new year or any day!
customer_reviews.text: I love the simple and easy to read format. Diane does such a great job of explaining the science behind everything. There is everything you need to get a quick start to Keto right at your fingertips - meal plans, recipes and great tips. A must have for your kitchen bookshelf!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Great Keto cookbook for Beginners.
customer_reviews.text: I have loved all of Diane's cookbooks, and this one is no different. I always love how she illustrates each recipe with beautiful pictures, and clear instructions. She also gives in depth information of the whole Keto process. I am new to trying Keto, and I love the ease of doing this lifestyle change with the help of her newest book. Thank you for another great cookbook!
customer_reviews.author: K. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: the wait was worth it
customer_reviews.text: I have been following Diane for years, when I heard her talk about this book I knew I had to get it. I have had to go low carb for my health and it is confusing. This book goes threw all of that the why's and what positive it does for our body and how. It gives you meal plans, shopping list, and of course recipes . but the savvy tracker is something I will use and love as I am a visual person . I could go on and on, but I love this book is all I can say. A huge bounus I my Keto libary. Thanks Diane. Debbie
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Brunssen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect book for jumping into Keto
customer_reviews.text: This book is amazing! It’s so in depth and well thought out. The recipes are approachable yet outside of what you’d dream up yourself and the photos are gorgeous. After reading this you’ll feel inspired to jump right in and also super educated on the why and how.
customer_reviews.author: Laur

customer_reviews.title: Practical approach to Keto!!
customer_reviews.text: The book is easy to follow. It walks you through getting started with Keto in very simple terms but also provides the science, data and processes going on in our bodies. The food lists are amazing and the recipes look delicious. The tracker printables will come in handy as well as the journal templates. The best part about this book however is its focus on real healthy nutrient dense foods. All too often online I see recipes for really junky Keto food and appreciate Diane’s focus on whole foods.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal beginners book!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t think it had an awful lot of recipes in it, but the informational part of it was phenomenal! I’ve been doing keto for almost a year now, and the information in this book helped me even more so. For an beginners guide, this book is awesome. And yes, it does have recipes in it and I’ve tried some and they are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Doty

customer_reviews.title: Absolute MUST buy!
customer_reviews.text: I am loving all the information in this book. Yes, it is a “cookbook” in the sense that it does have recipes but it also has a wealth of information besides the recipes! It has helped me feel like I’m eating “real” food again instead of what I was eating when I first started keto. I would love to see more sides in the recipe section because that seems to be the place that I lack but the recipes are on point and absolute delicious, even my picky no vegetable eating husband is enjoying these recipes!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great value, full of information and yummy recipes
customer_reviews.text: Diane’s books are always a great value for their money, and this book is no exception. The layout is incredibly easy to follow, the recipes are delicious, easy, and family friendly. The meal plan is the best I’ve ever seen, in that it is thoughtfully put together in a way that allows for leftovers and preps efficiently. I use this and other books but Diane pretty exclusively, because they are so delicious and easy!
customer_reviews.author: April Wenzel

customer_reviews.title: Great intro to REAL food -Keto
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciate all the work the author went to in explaining Keto and the benefits and science behind eating Keto. The meal plans are especially helpful for me& my spouse’s busy life. We were able to easily sit down, build a grocery list based on week 1 & get started. I’ve never seen a book with such an easy meal plan- the page # for the recipes is shown on the meal plan. It truly is a quick start into Keto way of eating!
customer_reviews.author: rhiannon luck

customer_reviews.title: Great cookbook + Lots of info
customer_reviews.text: Easy to follow recipes for those of us on the go. Great for meal prep. All the dishes are flavorful and delicious. The photos are beautiful and the information is plentiful. Would recommend this book over any other Leto book I own.
customer_reviews.author: V. P.

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t exactly know what I was getting into when I was preparing to start my Keto journey. This book is a step by step guide to show you how to sustainably make keto happen for just about anyone. Diane is amazing at teaching poeople to listen and follow what their own body is telling them and proceed from there. The recipes have all been delicious and fairly easy to make. Definitely recommend to anyone considering going Keto!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Food
customer_reviews.text: So far, I love the recipes in this book! I had already made myself pretty familiar with the keto content from other places, but I like her approaches to making it a little lighter and fitting keto into your life in an easier way. So far I’m obsessed with the spaghetti squash recipe with chicken thighs (forget the name right now because I don’t have the book in front of me, but you’ll find it and trust me, it’s great!). This book is a must have if you want to get to know the basics of keto in depth and have some great recipes to get you started. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Love this book!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m completely new to Keto and after reading this book I feel confident and knowledgeable on it. I’m informed and ready to start this journey. Most importantly I don’t feel overwhelmed or confused. Diane definitely lays it out so you can make it work for your own lifestyle!!! One last thing every recipe I’ve made has been amazing. Quick tip... buy the Balanced Bite spice blends!!!!
customer_reviews.author: DMC1980

customer_reviews.title: Another winner
customer_reviews.text: Diane’s books are full of great information, the layouts are colorful and pleasing to the eye and her writing is clear and concise. This book is no exception. It is fun to read. The recipes are fabulous and always delicious. Her meal plans make eating Keto fun and easy. Love this book!
customer_reviews.author: L. A. Paulsen

customer_reviews.title: Best keto book!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third book I own from Diane Sanfilippo. All her books are great, but this one is my favorite! I was a little nervous and overwhelmed with the thought of starting keto. Her book simplified it for me yet included lots of information in a very organized format. The recipes and meal plans are great! I would highly recommend this book!
customer_reviews.author: JLFoss

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Real Food Based Keto Book!!
customer_reviews.text: This is not your average Keto book! Diane’s focus is on real quality food (especially fats!) with a well rounded approach to macros. Easy to understand and full of information on understanding Keto and how it can work for you. I have tried most of the recipes and they are absolutely amazing. I have them in my regular rotation for meals and even non-Keto people love them. If you have ever wondered about Keto and how it really works, check out this book. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: april

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Resource
customer_reviews.text: First 9 chapters are all about keto and nutrition. Then the rest of the book is filled with fun recipes, weekly meal plans and shopping lists. There are even Instant Pot instructions for some recipes!
customer_reviews.author: Scott D. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: So much information!
customer_reviews.text: This cookbook is awesome!! There is SO much information regarding the keto diet/lifestyle that is priceless! The recipes have been very easy to make, extremely delicious, and very surprisingly filling!! My husband and I have really enjoyed it, and it has been a great help with getting back into a routine post-holidays. Even if you're not doing 100% keto (which I'm not due to being pregnant), it's a great resource and a way to clean up your diet. Simply add a starchy vegetable (ex: sweet potato or squash) for those needing more carbs, and you're set!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Easy read; great recipes
customer_reviews.text: This book is so approachable - not a bunch of science to get through. I love the approach she takes to make the eating plan sustainable, along with advice for customizing the ‘diet’ for your needs. The recipes I’ve tried have been quite delicious. I look forward to using this book regularly in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe there could be a better keto book on the market.
customer_reviews.text: The layout of the book is extremely thoughtful. I believe the author outdid herself with this amazing resource. Immediately after receiving this book and perusing the pages, I felt that keto was "doable" for me. It inspired me to try the diet. I've been on the keto diet ever since. The book was worth every penny!! I don't think a better keto book could possibly exist out there.
customer_reviews.author: Samarah

customer_reviews.title: Easy to understand education
customer_reviews.text: I'm only one chapter into this book so far and I LOVE it. Diane Sanfilippo doesn't spoon feed you "eat this, not that" - she actually educates people on how the body works and how food affects the body and it's systems. This results in empowerment. I already feel more equipped to make good choices for my health because I'm using my brain when I go to make decisions and not just my emotions and appetite. Diane Sanfilippo rocks!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great reference book on keto
customer_reviews.text: If you are thinking about trying keto or just like good recipes, this book is for you! Diane's real food based, realistic approach to the ketogenic diet makes this very doable. I love that includes information for athletes, women and how to adjust this diet to meet your individual needs. She also addresses many of the myths that are out there about this diet. Plus the recipes are delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi M. Griesmer

customer_reviews.title: A user-friendly Keto book
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this book because it has many helpful charts, tips and recipes. The style is conversational and pretty much covers everything related to transitioning to a Keto diet. I'd definitely recommend it for those who are interested in a Keto diet, and even those who are already doing Keto. Very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: SJ Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: It is a good book about keto and does a good job explaining what exactly it is but the recipes have so many ingredients and I cannot keep up with it. I need to go shopping all the time to achieve these meal plans, I don't like it. I might return it.
customer_reviews.author: ENOZ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! I’m definitely Keto ready with this book!
customer_reviews.text: This book is incredible! If want to be empowered doing Keto and really get a good understanding on how it works and how to properly tailor it to you personally then get this book! The recipes are delicious and very well balanced. I cannot recommend this book enough!
customer_reviews.author: JayCee

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Got kindle version and printed. Printed is best for the “cheat sheets”. Great explaination and plans. Great recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Return
customer_reviews.text: How do I return the book? I didn't like the recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Lucimara G.Perez

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: So far I am finding this book very useful in exploring Keto. My only problem is books should not be packaged so they can be bent to put in the mailbox. I had to put something heavy on it for 2 days to remove the bend in it.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: It’s working for me!
customer_reviews.text: I got so much from this book. Very professionally put together and easily understandable. I keep it nearby.
customer_reviews.author: MARY E. BUCHANAN

customer_reviews.title: Where to begin...this book is amazing
customer_reviews.text: If you’re keto, keto-curious, or just enjoy cook books this is for you. It’s a fully comprehensive breakdown of how to “do” keto for all types of situations. The daily tracker and the macro breakdown are extremely helpful. I love Diane and everything she does. 100% fully trusted source.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren A Geruso

customer_reviews.title: Excellent information and great recipes anyone can do!
customer_reviews.text: As a fellow graphic designer, As soon as I opened it I was hooked. The design is well done and super easy to read. Pleasing to the eye and made it look super practical to use. Turned to the salami and the spices page and was like say no more. I have arrived in the right book. I love that you can eat. Like really eat and not ashamed of it! Lol started cooking out of all my DS books and so far the husband is totally on board. I love the Meal plans the best and cook things we both can have. He is a carbie and I am not so we finally have a happy medium. Thanks Diane!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Love the recipes and all the info. Thanks for such a great book
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: New to keto
customer_reviews.text: I found this book enjoyable to read and it really breaks down the dos and don’ts of keto.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Real Food Approach to Keto!
customer_reviews.text: I have been a die-hard fan of Diane's for years! All of her books are loaded with so much information, including graphs and charts! I have come to love those detailed charts and graphs and KQS is NO exception! One of her previous books, Practical Paleo (which pretty much changed my life), is often times referred to as the "Paleo Bible", and I fully expect this one to earn the nickname"Keto Bible"! If you haven't already, I highly recommend you add this book to your collection, because even if you don't intend to follow a strictly Keto approach to eating, the information and recipes in this book are incredible!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Bassett

customer_reviews.title: So much more than just recipes!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with Keto Quick Start! I got it yesterday and have read the whole thing. The Spiced Stuffed Eggplant was delicious today and I can’t even decide what to make next since I’m drooling over everything. This is so much more than a cookbook. It includes such great information well above and beyond the delicious recipes. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Kane

customer_reviews.title: A great intro to KETO from someone who cares!
customer_reviews.text: I love this book. I have Practical Paleo and listen to the Balanced Bites podcast. I was skeptical about Keto and one day on her Instagram, Diane was taking questions. Not only did she answer my concern but then followed up with me. I pre-ordered the book that day and have made about 5 recipes. I love the first part of the book because it was an education, not just a 5 page intro and then recipes. I am slowly transitioning to Keto and this has been such a useful tool. I cannot wait to try more recipes! Thanks Diane!
customer_reviews.author: K.H

customer_reviews.title: An easy read
customer_reviews.text: Love the spiral binding. I keep the book in my kitchen. It is attractive with many color photos. The information is easy to digest and understand. Great for beginners but also for people who want to continue on a very healthy eating regimen. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.M.

customer_reviews.title: should buy!
customer_reviews.text: I am not someone who follows a keto diet but I love Diane's recipes so i bought it. It's filled with all kinds of information and some really great recipes. I love the whole foods based approach instead of the other cheese and bacon filled keto books!
customer_reviews.author: Alycia I

customer_reviews.title: Textbook-ish
customer_reviews.text: The recipes were difficult, the is diet expensive, and all that information gave me the Keto Flu!
customer_reviews.author: Traci Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great recipes for meat eaters
customer_reviews.text: The book is good for meat eaters but what about vegetarian. I dont see much options unless you take out the meat, but still you dont have much o To select from. If your a vegetarian do not buy the book, please google recipes online you have much more options.
customer_reviews.author: Raxa Patel-Rana

customer_reviews.title: Great Content
customer_reviews.text: This book is full of great information, easy to read and understand, has tons of delicious recipes, and has stunning photography. A huge thank you to Diane Sanfilippo for all of her research and knowledge in compiling such great content on the healthy way to eat Keto. I especially love that she has added easy adaptations to the recipes to make substitutions easy for those of us with other dietary concerns.
customer_reviews.author: Brook G.

customer_reviews.title: Great keto resource!
customer_reviews.text: I own most of Diane’s books and I love them! So I bought this one too. It does not disappoint. The recipes are great! Her way of tracking macros is pretty simple. Another thing I really like is it’s not quite as high fat as some of the other keto approaches out there. Job well done!
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Nice book, too much for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: There are just too many weird grocery items that one doesnt have around! Alot of these recipes have xarb counts near 30. Thatsnot the 20 or less that beginners use. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: LBH

customer_reviews.title: Fits all my doctor requirements!
customer_reviews.text: Diane made keto make sense for me! I had bariatric surgery and am looking to find an eating plan to sustain for life yet still meet calorie and protein requirements from my surgeon. Diane’s keto plan does that! It also focuses on veggies, healthy fats (not just fat bombs) and being overall healthy!
customer_reviews.author: J. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Something for Everyone
customer_reviews.text: Diane does an amazing job laying out content and information that makes this book valuable to a wide range of keto eaters (new to the concepts or following the guidelines for awhile). Her recipes, amazing as always!!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: This book is absolutely worth reading and cooking from
customer_reviews.text: I love all of Diane Sanfilippo's books and this one did not disappoint, it is fantastic. I have already made the Super Garlic Stir fry, Spaghetti bolognese, the kale and bacon frittata, spicy slaw, quick salsa, and quick guacamole and they were all delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great resource!
customer_reviews.text: This book is full of helpful information about keto. I love Diane's approach because she focuses on nutrient-dense protein and vegetables. So many keto books are filled with processed meats, crazy amounts of dairy, and fake sweeteners. Not this one! So far, the Thai meatballs are my favorite recipe.
customer_reviews.author: Katie M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Keto Resource!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this book! This is the first health/diet book my husband has read and said that everything in it made so much sense. It’s full of information without being too wordy or complicated. Just a direct helpful resource for someone, like us, who are trying this at the recomendation of doctor.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Fudge

customer_reviews.title: So delicious and she knows her crap
customer_reviews.text: CONFESSION don’t arrest me but after listening to Diane on a podcast I went into Barnes and noble and took a picture of the sloppy joe chili but ended up not purchasing the cookbook. After my husband and I demolished it and he kept raving about the recipe I knew I had to actually purchase the damn thing! So glad I did this book is everything!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bonniereilly1

product_meta.title: Keto Quick Start: A Beginner's Guide to a Whole-Foods Ketogenic Diet with More Than 100 Recipes
